title: Tales from the Borderlands (2014) PC [RePack]

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Tales from the Borderlands is a five part episodic game series from the
creators of The Wolf Among Us and The Walking Dead: A Telltale Games
Series. Set on the unforgiving world of Pandora after the events seen in
Borderlands 2, this is a story full of Borderlands' trademark humor
following two adventurers on their quest for greatness
